Uses of Package
eu.opends.environment.TrafficLightException

Packages that use eu.opends.environment.TrafficLightException
Package Description
eu.opends.environment  
eu.opends.environment.TrafficLightException  
  • Classes in eu.opends.environment.TrafficLightException used by eu.opends.environment
    Class Description
    AlwaysGreenException
    This Exception will be thrown if a request for remaining green cannot be replied since the traffic light will be green all the time.
    InvalidStateCharacterException
    This Exception will be thrown if a character in the state string of a traffic light phase occurs, which is not SUMO compatible.
    IsGreenException
    This Exception will be thrown if a request for remaining red cannot be replied since the traffic light is currently green.
    IsNotGreenException
    This Exception will be thrown if a request for remaining green cannot be replied since the traffic light is currently not green.
    NeverGreenException
    This Exception will be thrown if a request for remaining red cannot be replied since the traffic light will be never green.
    NoInternalProgramException
    This Exception will be thrown if no internal program can be found for given intersection ID or traffic light ID.
  • Classes in eu.opends.environment.TrafficLightException used by eu.opends.environment.TrafficLightException
    Class Description
    TrafficLightException
    Super class for all traffic light related exceptions.
